name: The Rail, the River and the Bush
name_original: The Rail, the River and the Bush
description:
The Rail, the River and the Bush is a college project. It was made to depict an enviromental crisis from which we chose madeira-mamoré. The game is seen trough the eyes of a bush dog in a first person, survival experience. We tried our best to represent how the enviroment was affected as the rail road in madeira-mamoré was built, as well as touch a bit on the human lives lost.

     We at Gamedust really hope you can enjoy our game.
